name: resolveRelativeAudioSourceReference(for:with:)
desc: Resolves the audio source using a relative qualifier.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.
declaration:
optional func resolveRelativeAudioSourceReference(for intent: INSetAudioSourceInCarIntent, 
                                             with completion: @escaping (INRelativeReferenceResolutionResult) -> Void)
